definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="0" y="0"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">enableGravity will be false at start so the bullet gravity will be set to true meaning no-gravity. when enableGravity is true gravity will be restored since the else is activated when the if is not true so when enableGravity is true</comment><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">enableGravity</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_nogravity"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="gravityValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_set_nogravity"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="gravityValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">80</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_set"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">this is a measure to prevent a bullet from traveling forever, after 200 ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) the bullet will have gravity and fall to the ground</comment><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">enableGravity</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
